targets.rawSql:
with hosts_by_cluster as (
 	select e.oid as pm_oid,
 		   g.oid as cluster_oid,
 		   g.name as cluster_name
 	from entity as e
 	join scope s on s.seed_oid = e.oid
 	join entity g on g.oid = s.scoped_oid 
 	where s.scoped_type = 'COMPUTE_CLUSTER'
 	and e.type = 'PHYSICAL_MACHINE'
 	and g.type = 'COMPUTE_CLUSTER'
 	and s.scoped_oid in ($Cluster)
 	and (start, finish) OVERLAPS ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
 	and (e.first_seen, e.last_seen) OVERLAPS ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
 	and (e.first_seen, g.last_seen) OVERLAPS ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
 ),
 
 pm_stats as (
 	select pm_oid,
 		  AVG(cpu_used) as cpu_used,
 		  MAX(cpu_used) as cpu_max,
 		  percentile_cont(.97) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY cpu_used) as cpu_percentile,
 		  avg(cpu_capacity) as cpu_capacity
 	from 
	 	(select entity_oid as pm_oid
	 	      ,current as cpu_used
	 	      ,capacity as cpu_capacity
	 	      ,time
	 	  from metric
	 	  where type = 'CPU'
	 	  and consumed is null
	 	  and $__timeFilter(time)
	 	  and entity_type = 'PHYSICAL_MACHINE'
	 	 ) as data
	 group by 1
 )
 
 select SPLIT_PART(cluster_name, '/', 1) as "Datacenter"
       ,SPLIT_PART(cluster_name, '/', 2) as "Cluster Name"
       ,avg(cpu_max)/nullif(avg(cpu_capacity),0) as "CPU Util Max"
       ,avg(cpu_used)/nullif(avg(cpu_capacity),0) as "CPU Util Avg"
       ,avg(cpu_percentile)/nullif(avg(cpu_capacity), 0) as "CPU Util 97%"
       ,sum(cpu_capacity)*1000000 as "CPU Capacity"
       ,sum(cpu_max)*1000000 as "CPU Used Max"
       ,sum(cpu_used)*1000000 as "CPU Used Avg"
   from hosts_by_cluster, pm_stats
   where pm_stats.pm_oid = hosts_by_cluster.pm_oid
   group by 1, 2
   order by 1, 2

with hosts_by_cluster as (
 	select e.oid as pm_oid,
 		   g.oid as cluster_oid,
 		   g.name as cluster_name
 	from entity as e
 	join scope s on s.seed_oid = e.oid
 	join entity g on g.oid = s.scoped_oid 
 	where s.scoped_type = 'COMPUTE_CLUSTER'
 	and e.type = 'PHYSICAL_MACHINE'
 	and g.type = 'COMPUTE_CLUSTER'
 	AND g.oid in ($Cluster)
 	and (start, finish) OVERLAPS ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
 	and (e.first_seen, e.last_seen) OVERLAPS ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
 	and (e.first_seen, g.last_seen) OVERLAPS ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
 ),
 
 pm_stats as (
 	select entity_oid as pm_oid
	 	      ,current as cpu_used
	 	      ,capacity as cpu_capacity
	 	      ,time
	 	  from metric
	 	  where type = 'CPU'
	 	  and consumed is null
	 	  and $__timeFilter(time)
 )
 
 select cluster_name as "Cluster Name"
       ,time
       ,avg(cpu_used)/nullif(avg(cpu_capacity),0) as "CPU Util"
   from hosts_by_cluster, pm_stats
   where pm_stats.pm_oid = hosts_by_cluster.pm_oid
   group by 1, 2
   ORDER BY time asc

with hosts_by_cluster as (
 	select e.oid as pm_oid,
 		   g.oid as cluster_oid,
 		   g.name as cluster_name
 	from entity as e
 	join scope s on s.seed_oid = e.oid
 	join entity g on g.oid = s.scoped_oid 
 	where s.scoped_type = 'COMPUTE_CLUSTER'
 	and e.type = 'PHYSICAL_MACHINE'
 	and g.type = 'COMPUTE_CLUSTER'
 	and s.scoped_oid in ($Cluster)
 	and (start, finish) OVERLAPS ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
 	and (e.first_seen, e.last_seen) OVERLAPS ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
 	and (e.first_seen, g.last_seen) OVERLAPS ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
 ),
 
 pm_stats as (
 	select pm_oid,
 		  AVG(mem_used) as mem_used,
 		  MAX(mem_used) as mem_max,
 		  percentile_cont(.97) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY mem_used) as mem_percentile,
 		  avg(mem_capacity) as mem_capacity
 	from 
	 	(select entity_oid as pm_oid
	 	      ,current as mem_used
	 	      ,capacity as mem_capacity
	 	      ,time
	 	  from metric
	 	  where type = 'MEM'
	 	  and consumed is null
	 	  and $__timeFilter(time)
	 	  and entity_type = 'PHYSICAL_MACHINE'
	 	 ) as data
	 group by 1
 )
 
 select SPLIT_PART(cluster_name, '/', 1) as "Datacenter"
       ,SPLIT_PART(cluster_name, '/', 2) as "Cluster Name"
       ,avg(mem_max)/nullif(avg(mem_capacity),0) as "Mem Util Max"
       ,avg(mem_used)/nullif(avg(mem_capacity),0) as "Mem Util Avg"
       ,avg(mem_percentile)/nullif(avg(mem_capacity), 0) as "Mem Util 97%"
       ,sum(mem_capacity)/1024/1024 as "Mem Capacity"
       ,sum(mem_max)/1024/1024 as "Mem Used Max"
       ,sum(mem_used)/1024/1024 as "Mem Used Avg"
   from hosts_by_cluster, pm_stats
   where pm_stats.pm_oid = hosts_by_cluster.pm_oid
   group by 1, 2
   order by 1, 2

with hosts_by_cluster as (
 	select e.oid as pm_oid,
 		   g.oid as cluster_oid,
 		   g.name as cluster_name
 	from entity as e
 	join scope s on s.seed_oid = e.oid
 	join entity g on g.oid = s.scoped_oid 
 	where s.scoped_type = 'COMPUTE_CLUSTER'
 	and e.type = 'PHYSICAL_MACHINE'
 	and g.type = 'COMPUTE_CLUSTER'
 	AND g.oid in ($Cluster)
 	and (start, finish) OVERLAPS ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
 	and (e.first_seen, e.last_seen) OVERLAPS ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
 	and (e.first_seen, g.last_seen) OVERLAPS ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
 ),
 
 pm_stats as (
 	select entity_oid as pm_oid
	 	      ,current as cpu_used
	 	      ,capacity as cpu_capacity
	 	      ,time
	 	  from metric
	 	  where type = 'MEM'
	 	  and consumed is null
	 	  and $__timeFilter(time)
	 	  and entity_type = 'PHYSICAL_MACHINE'
 )
 
 select cluster_name as "Cluster Name"
       ,time
       ,avg(cpu_used)/nullif(avg(cpu_capacity),0) as "CPU Util"
   from hosts_by_cluster, pm_stats
   where pm_stats.pm_oid = hosts_by_cluster.pm_oid
   group by 1, 2
   ORDER BY time asc

-- Host Stats Panel
with pms_by_cluster as (
    SELECT DISTINCT ON (e.oid)
        g.name as cluster_name,
        g.oid as cluster_oid,
        e.oid as pm_oid,
        e.name as pm_name
      FROM entity e
      JOIN scope s1 ON (s1.seed_oid = e.oid)
      JOIN entity g ON (g.oid = s1.scoped_oid)
     WHERE e.type = 'PHYSICAL_MACHINE'
       AND (s1.scoped_type = 'COMPUTE_CLUSTER')
       AND (s1.scoped_oid in ($Cluster))
       AND (e.first_seen, e.last_seen) OVERLAPS ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
       AND (s1.start, s1.finish) OVERLAPS ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
),

pm_stats as (
     select pm_oid
          ,avg(cpu_used) as cpu_used_avg
          ,max(cpu_used) as cpu_used_max
          ,percentile_cont(.97) within group (order by cpu_used/cpu_capacity asc) cpu_util_percentile
          ,avg(cpu_used/cpu_capacity) as cpu_util_avg
          ,max(cpu_used/cpu_capacity) as cpu_util_max
          ,avg(cpu_capacity) as cpu_capacity 
          ,avg(mem_used) as mem_used_avg
          ,max(mem_used) as mem_used_max
          ,percentile_cont(.97) within group (order by mem_used/mem_capacity asc) mem_util_percentile
          ,avg(mem_used/mem_capacity) as mem_util_avg
          ,max(mem_used/mem_capacity) as mem_util_max
          ,avg(mem_capacity) as mem_capacity
    from
        (SELECT entity_oid as pm_oid
               ,time
               ,max(current) FILTER (where type = 'CPU') as cpu_used
               ,max(capacity)  FILTER (where type = 'CPU') as cpu_capacity
               ,max(current) FILTER (where type = 'MEM') as mem_used
               ,max(capacity)  FILTER (where type = 'MEM') as mem_capacity
          FROM metric
         WHERE type in ('CPU', 'MEM')
           AND $__timeFilter(time)
           AND consumed is null
           and entity_type = 'PHYSICAL_MACHINE'
         GROUP BY 1,2) as cluster_stats
    group by 1
)

select SPLIT_PART(cluster_name, '/', 1) as "Datacenter",
       SPLIT_PART(cluster_name, '/', 2) as "Cluster Name",
       pm_name as "Host Name",
       cpu_capacity*1000000 as "CPU Capacity (MHz)",
       cpu_used_avg*1000000 as "CPU Avg Used (MHz)",
       cpu_used_max*1000000 as "CPU Max Used (MHz)",
       cpu_util_avg*100 as "CPU Avg Util (%)",
       cpu_util_max*100 as "CPU Max Util (%)",
       cpu_util_percentile*100 as "CPU Percentile Util (%)",
       mem_capacity/1024/1024 as "Mem Capacity (GB)",
       mem_used_avg/1024/1024 as "Mem Avg Used (GB)",
       mem_used_max/1024/1024 as "Mem Max Used (GB)",
       mem_util_avg*100 as "Mem Avg Util (%)",
       mem_util_max*100 as "Mem Max Util (%)",
       mem_util_percentile*100 as "Mem Percentile Util (%)"
  from pm_stats
  JOIN pms_by_cluster on pms_by_cluster.pm_oid = pm_stats.pm_oid
 order by 1, 2, 3
;

-- Datastore Stats Panel
with ds_by_cluster as (
    SELECT DISTINCT ON (e.oid)
        g.name as cluster_name,
        g.oid as cluster_oid,
        e.oid as ds_oid,
        e.name as ds_name
      FROM entity e
      JOIN scope s1 ON (s1.seed_oid = e.oid)
      JOIN entity g ON (g.oid = s1.scoped_oid)
     WHERE e.type = 'STORAGE'
       AND (s1.scoped_type = 'COMPUTE_CLUSTER')
       AND (s1.scoped_oid in ($Cluster))
       AND (e.first_seen, e.last_seen) OVERLAPS ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
       AND (s1.start, s1.finish) OVERLAPS ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
),

ds_stats as (
    select cluster_name
          ,avg(stor_used) as stor_used
          ,avg(stor_used/stor_capacity) as stor_util
          ,avg(stor_capacity) as stor_capacity
          ,avg(stor_provisioned) as stor_provisioned
          ,avg(iops_used) as iops_avg
          ,max(iops_used) as iops_max
          ,avg(latency_used) as latency_avg
          ,max(latency_used) as latency_max
    from
        (SELECT cluster_oid
               ,cluster_name
               ,time
               ,sum(current) FILTER (where type = 'STORAGE_AMOUNT') as stor_used
               ,sum(capacity) FILTER (where type = 'STORAGE_AMOUNT') as stor_capacity
               ,sum(current) FILTER (where type = 'STORAGE_PROVISIONED') as stor_provisioned
               ,sum(current) FILTER (where type = 'STORAGE_LATENCY') as latency_used
               ,sum(current) FILTER (where type = 'STORAGE_ACCESS') as iops_used
          FROM metric
          JOIN ds_by_cluster on ds_by_cluster.ds_oid = metric.entity_oid
         WHERE type in ('STORAGE_AMOUNT', 'STORAGE_PROVISIONED', 'STORAGE_LATENCY', 'STORAGE_ACCESS')
           AND $__timeFilter(time)
           AND consumed is null
           and entity_type = 'STORAGE'
         GROUP BY 1, 2, 3) as cluster_stats
    group by 1
)


select SPLIT_PART(cluster_name, '/', 1) as "Datacenter",
       SPLIT_PART(cluster_name, '/', 2) as "Cluster Name",
       stor_used/1024 as "Storage Used (GB)",
       stor_capacity/1024 as "Storage Capacity (GB)",
       stor_provisioned/1024 as "Storage Provisioned (GB)",
       latency_avg as "Storage Latency Used",
       latency_max as "Storage Latency Peak",
       iops_avg as "Iops Used",
       iops_max as "Iops Peak"
  from ds_stats
  order by 1, 2
;

panels.title: Datastore | Cluster Storage Performance and Utilization

targets.rawSql:
with hosts_by_cluster as (
 	select e.oid as ds_oid,
 		   g.oid as cluster_oid,
 		   g.name as cluster_name
 	from entity as e
 	join scope s on s.seed_oid = e.oid
 	join entity g on g.oid = s.scoped_oid 
 	where s.scoped_type = 'COMPUTE_CLUSTER'
 	and e.type = 'STORAGE'
 	and g.type = 'COMPUTE_CLUSTER'
 	AND g.oid in ($Cluster)
 	and (start, finish) OVERLAPS ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
 	and (e.first_seen, e.last_seen) OVERLAPS ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
 	and (e.first_seen, g.last_seen) OVERLAPS ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
 ),
 
 ds_stats as (
 	select entity_oid as ds_oid
	 	      ,current as stor_latency_used
	 	      ,time
	 	  from metric
	 	  where type = 'STORAGE_LATENCY'
	 	  and consumed is null
	 	  and $__timeFilter(time)
 )
 
 select cluster_name as "Cluster Name"
       ,time
       ,avg(stor_latency_used) as "Storage Latency Util"
   from hosts_by_cluster, ds_stats
   where ds_stats.ds_oid = hosts_by_cluster.ds_oid
   group by 1, 2
   ORDER BY time asc

with hosts_by_cluster as (
 	select e.oid as ds_oid,
 		   g.oid as cluster_oid,
 		   g.name as cluster_name
 	from entity as e
 	join scope s on s.seed_oid = e.oid
 	join entity g on g.oid = s.scoped_oid 
 	where s.scoped_type = 'COMPUTE_CLUSTER'
 	and e.type = 'STORAGE'
 	and g.type = 'COMPUTE_CLUSTER'
 	AND g.oid in ($Cluster)
 	and (start, finish) OVERLAPS ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
 	and (e.first_seen, e.last_seen) OVERLAPS ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
 	and (e.first_seen, g.last_seen) OVERLAPS ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
 ),
 
 ds_stats as (
 	select entity_oid as ds_oid
	 	      ,current as stor_iops_used
	 	      ,time
	 	  from metric
	 	  where type = 'STORAGE_ACCESS'
	 	  and consumed is null
	 	  and $__timeFilter(time)
 )
 
 select cluster_name as "Cluster Name"
       ,time
       ,avg(stor_iops_used) as "Storage IOPS"
   from hosts_by_cluster, ds_stats
   where ds_stats.ds_oid = hosts_by_cluster.ds_oid
   group by 1, 2
   ORDER BY time asc

-- Datastore Stats Panel
with ds_by_cluster as (
    SELECT DISTINCT ON (e.oid)
        g.name as cluster_name,
        g.oid as cluster_oid,
        e.oid as ds_oid,
        e.name as ds_name
      FROM entity e
      JOIN scope s1 ON (s1.seed_oid = e.oid)
      JOIN entity g ON (g.oid = s1.scoped_oid)
     WHERE e.type = 'STORAGE'
       AND (s1.scoped_type = 'COMPUTE_CLUSTER')
       AND (s1.scoped_oid in ($Cluster))
       AND (e.first_seen, e.last_seen) OVERLAPS ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
       AND (s1.start, s1.finish) OVERLAPS ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
),

ds_stats as (
     select ds_oid
          ,avg(stor_used) as stor_used
          ,avg(stor_used/stor_capacity) as stor_util
          ,avg(stor_capacity) as stor_capacity
          ,avg(stor_provisioned) as stor_provisioned
          ,avg(iops_used) as iops_avg
          ,max(iops_used) as iops_max
          ,avg(latency_used) as latency_avg
          ,max(latency_used) as latency_max
    from
        (SELECT entity_oid as ds_oid
               ,time
               ,max(current) FILTER (where type = 'STORAGE_AMOUNT') as stor_used
               ,max(capacity) FILTER (where type = 'STORAGE_AMOUNT') as stor_capacity
               ,max(current) FILTER (where type = 'STORAGE_PROVISIONED') as stor_provisioned
               ,max(current) FILTER (where type = 'STORAGE_LATENCY') as latency_used
               ,max(current) FILTER (where type = 'STORAGE_ACCESS') as iops_used
          FROM metric
         WHERE type in ('STORAGE_AMOUNT', 'STORAGE_PROVISIONED', 'STORAGE_LATENCY', 'STORAGE_ACCESS')
           AND $__timeFilter(time)
           AND consumed is null
           and entity_type = 'STORAGE'
         GROUP BY 1,2) as cluster_stats
    group by 1
)


-- TODO: Update all of the column names below with the new names above


select SPLIT_PART(cluster_name, '/', 1) as "Datacenter",
       SPLIT_PART(cluster_name, '/', 2) as "Cluster Name",
       ds_name as "Datastore",
       stor_used/1024 as "Storage Used (GB)",
       stor_capacity/1024 as "Storage Capacity (GB)",
       stor_provisioned/1024 as "Storage Provisioned (GB)",
       latency_avg as "Storage Latency Used",
       latency_max as "Storage Latency Peak",
       iops_avg as "Iops Used",
       iops_max as "Iops Peak"
  from ds_stats
  join ds_by_cluster on ds_stats.ds_oid = ds_by_cluster.ds_oid
  order by 1, 2, 3
;

panels.title: Datastore | Cluster Storage Performance and Utilization

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT name as __text
             ,oid as __value
   FROM entity
 WHERE type = 'DATACENTER'
AND (first_seen, last_seen) overlaps ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
ORDER BY 1
list.name: Datacenter
list.query:
SELECT DISTINCT name as __text
             ,oid as __value
   FROM entity
 WHERE type = 'DATACENTER'
AND (first_seen, last_seen) overlaps ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
ORDER BY 1

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT name as __text
            ,oid as __value
   FROM entity e
   JOIN scope s on s.seed_oid = e.oid
 WHERE e.type = 'COMPUTE_CLUSTER'
  AND (e.first_seen, e.last_seen) overlaps ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
  and s.scoped_type = 'DATACENTER'
  and s.scoped_oid in ($Datacenter)
list.name: Cluster
list.query:
SELECT DISTINCT name as __text
            ,oid as __value
   FROM entity e
   JOIN scope s on s.seed_oid = e.oid
 WHERE e.type = 'COMPUTE_CLUSTER'
  AND (e.first_seen, e.last_seen) overlaps ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
  and s.scoped_type = 'DATACENTER'
  and s.scoped_oid in ($Datacenter)
